Title: Hermetic Insurance
Description:
Ah, the latest group have gathered beneath my wings like chicks to a mother crow. You've done well so far, $p. They trust you. 

I trust you.

The next step in shepherding these simple souls along in their diabolical journeys is to safeguard them against the void. Against oblivion. Against death.

Take my soulstone and use it to gird the willing... and the damned.
ObjectivesText: Use Madam Shadow's Soulstone on willing initiates in the Darkmoon Faire.
